title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre alternately flirty and prankish today, depending on who piques your interest and your mood. Youre likely full of provocative, frisky energy, and youre happy to keep everyone guessing with your unpredictable behavior. The truth is youre only looking for amusement and fun now. However, its important to remember that people arent in your space solely for your entertainment. Scoring a good laugh all hangs on whether you choose folks who are willing to play and frolic with you. You might be better off suggesting a puzzle or game instead of making sport of someone. Laughter is the best medicine when its inclusive. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
